[Gwir ddeongliad breuddwydion] Oneirocritica. Welsh Artemidorus, Daldianus.
20+ p.
By Thomas Jones, [Shrewsbury : 1698]
Translation of Artemidorus Daldianus' Oneirocritica. Imperfect: torn, t.p. and all after p. [20] lacking; title and imprint from Wing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales (Aberystwyth, Wales)
=======
